decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted  therewith (Design and Access Statement, Daylight report, transport assessment, application drawings received 17/8/12, Amended plans A18711260P4, A18711260P5 received 19/9/12) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
description: Change of use of 815 sqm leisure space (class D2), 191 sqm office space (Class B1) and 58 sqm office plant space to provide 13 private residential units (Class C3), together with the change of use of 143 sqm office storage space (Class B1) to a residents gym (Class D2).   Internal alterations and the change from 2 louvred openings to 2 windows on the Gallery extension and 2 louvred openings to 2 windows on the southern elevation of the east wing.
